New Records: De'Aaron Fox fell 1 point short of Kobe Bryant's combined scoring record on consecutive nights
Key Match Events: De'Aaron Fox scored 49 points in a 121-117 win over the Utah Jazz
Post-Match Reflections: De'Aaron Fox offered a mock apology for missing four of his eight free throws in the fourth quarter
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Sacramento Kings are up next to play the Atlanta Hawks, who rank 25th in defensive rating
